description:
Yin and Ning begin traveling towards the rebel base in order to meet Mo Heng, the man developing a new weapon.
Meanwhile, in the Taibai Empire, Construct Commander Meng Ji makes the decision to begin mass-producing the new model of construct. Zhao insists the new model is still a prototype and opposes its mass-production, but Commander Meng Ji claims they must hurry in order to conquer the world. Upon hearing their arguments, Empress Cheng also orders the mass-production of constructs.
Zhao leaves his underlings to look after matters at the Construct Palace while he departs with the mobile unit in search of the magic-using rebels he fought previously.
Source: crunchyroll
